verses.verse: These are the words<WH1697> which Moses<WH4872> spake<WH1696> unto all Israel<WH3478> beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383> in the wilderness<WH4057>, in the Arabah<WH6160> over against<WH4136> Suph<WH5489>, between Paran<WH6290>, and Tophel<WH8603>, and Laban<WH3837>, and Hazeroth<WH2698>, and Di-zahab<WH1774>.
It is eleven<WH259> days<WH3117>' journey from Horeb<WH2722> by the way<WH1870> of mount<WH2022> Seir<WH8165> unto Kadesh-barnea<WH6947>.

And it came to pass in the fortieth<WH705> year<WH8141>, in the eleventh<WH6249> month<WH2320>, on the first<WH259> day of the month<WH2320>, that Moses<WH4872> spake<WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, according unto all that Jehovah<WH3068> had given him in commandment unto them<WH6680>;

after <WH310> he had smitten<WH5221> Sihon<WH5511> the king<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567>, who dwelt<WH3427> in Heshbon<WH2809>, and Og<WH5747> the king<WH4428> of Bashan<WH1316>, who dwelt<WH3427> in Ashtaroth<WH6252>, at Edrei<WH154>.
Beyond <WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383>, in the land<WH776> of Moab<WH4124>, began<WH2974> Moses<WH4872> to declare<WH874> this law<WH8451>, saying<WH559>,
Jehovah <WH3068> our God<WH430> spake<WH1696> unto us in Horeb<WH2722>, saying<WH559>, Ye have dwelt<WH3427> long enough<WH7227> in this mountain<WH2022>:

turn <WH6437> you<WH5265>, and take your journey, and go<WH935> to the hill-country<WH2022> of the Amorites<WH567>, and unto all the places nigh<WH7934> thereunto<WH6160>, in the Arabah, in the hill-country<WH2022>, and in the lowland<WH8219>, and in the South<WH5045>, and by the<WH3220> sea-shore<WH2348>, the land<WH776> of the Canaanites<WH3669>, and Lebanon<WH3844>, as far as the great<WH1419> river<WH5104>, the river<WH5104> Euphrates<WH6578>.

Behold <WH7200>, I have set<WH5414> the land<WH776> before<WH6440> you<WH935>: go in and possess<WH3423> the land<WH776> which Jehovah<WH3068> sware<WH7650> unto your fathers<WH1>, to Abraham<WH85>, to Isaac<WH3327>, and to Jacob<WH3290>, to give<WH5414> unto them and to their seed<WH2233> after them<WH310>.
And I spake<WH559> unto you at that time<WH6256>, saying<WH559>, I am not able<WH3201> to bear<WH5375> you myself alone<WH905>:
Jehovah <WH3068> your God<WH430> hath multiplied<WH7235> you<WH3117>, and, behold, ye are this day as the stars<WH3556> of heaven<WH8064> for multitude<WH7230>.
Jehovah <WH3068>, the God<WH430> of your fathers<WH1>, make you a thousand<WH505> times<WH6471> as many as<WH3254> ye are<WH1288>, and bless you<WH1696>, as he hath promised you!
How <WH349> can I myself alone bear<WH5375> your cumbrance<WH2960>, and your burden<WH4853>, and your strife<WH7379>?
Take <WH3051> you wise<WH2450> men<WH582>, and understanding<WH995>, and known<WH3045>, according to your tribes<WH7626>, and I will make<WH7760> them heads over you<WH7218>.
And ye answered<WH6030> me<WH559>, and said, The thing<WH1697> which thou hast spoken<WH1696> is good<WH2896> for us to do<WH6213>.

So I took<WH3947> the heads<WH7218> of your tribes<WH7626>, wise<WH2450> men<WH582>, and known<WH3045>, and made<WH5414> them heads<WH7218> over you<WH8269>, captains of thousands<WH505>, and captains<WH8269> of hundreds<WH3967>, and captains<WH8269> of fifties<WH2572>, and captains<WH8269> of tens<WH6235>, and officers<WH7860>, according to your tribes<WH7626>.

And I charged<WH6680> your judges<WH8199> at that time<WH6256>, saying<WH559>, Hear<WH8085> the causes between your brethren<WH251>, and judge<WH8199> righteously<WH6664> between a man<WH376> and his brother<WH251>, and the sojourner that is with him<WH1616>.

Ye shall not respect<WH5234> persons<WH6440> in judgment<WH4941>; ye shall hear<WH8085> the small<WH6996> and the great<WH1419> alike<WH1481>; ye shall not be afraid of the face<WH6440> of man<WH376>; for the judgment<WH4941> is God<WH430>'s: and the cause<WH1697> that is too hard<WH7185> for you ye shall bring<WH7126> unto me<WH8085>, and I will hear it.
And I commanded<WH6680> you at that time<WH6256> all the things<WH1697> which ye should do<WH6213>.

And we journeyed<WH5265> from Horeb<WH2722>, and went through<WH3212> all that great<WH1419> and terrible<WH3372> wilderness<WH4057> which ye saw<WH7200>, by the way<WH1870> to the hill-country<WH2022> of the Amorites<WH567>, as Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> us<WH935>; and we came to Kadesh-barnea<WH6947>.
And I said<WH559> unto you<WH935>, Ye are come unto the hill-country<WH2022> of the Amorites<WH567>, which Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430> giveth unto us<WH5414>.

Behold <WH7200>, Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath set<WH5414> the land<WH776> before<WH6440> thee<WH5927>: go up, take possession<WH3423>, as Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of thy fathers<WH1>, hath spoken<WH1696> unto thee<WH3372>; fear not<WH2865>, neither be dismayed.

And ye came near<WH7126> unto me every one of you<WH559>, and said, Let us send<WH7971> men<WH582> before<WH6440> us<WH2658>, that they may search the land<WH776> for us<WH7725>, and bring us word<WH1697> again<WH7725> of the way<WH1870> by which we must go up<WH5927>, and the cities<WH5892> unto which we shall come<WH935>.
And the thing<WH1697> pleased me well<WH3190>; and I took<WH3947> twelve<WH8147> men<WH582> of you<WH259>, one man for every tribe<WH376>:
and they turned<WH6437> and went up<WH5927> into the hill-country<WH2022>, and came<WH935> unto the valley<WH5158> of Eshcol<WH812>, and spied it out<WH7270>.

And they took<WH3947> of the fruit<WH6529> of the land<WH776> in their hands<WH3027>, and brought it down<WH3381> unto us<WH7725>, and brought us word<WH1697> again<WH7725>, and said<WH559>, It is a good<WH2896> land<WH776> which Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430> giveth unto us<WH5414>.
Yet ye would<WH14> not go up<WH5927>, but rebelled<WH4784> against the commandment<WH6310> of Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>:

and ye murmured<WH7279> in your tents<WH168>, and said<WH559>, Because Jehovah<WH3068> hated<WH8135> us<WH3318>, he hath brought us forth out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, to deliver<WH5414> us into the hand<WH3027> of the Amorites<WH567>, to destroy us<WH8045>.

Whither are we going up<WH5927>? our brethren<WH251> have made our heart<WH3824> to melt<WH4549>, saying<WH559>, The people<WH5971> are greater<WH1419> and taller<WH7311> than we<WH5892>; the cities are great<WH1419> and fortified up<WH1219> to heaven<WH8064>; and moreover we have seen<WH7200> the sons<WH1121> of the Anakim there<WH6062>.
Then I said<WH559> unto you<WH6206>, Dread not<WH3372>, neither be afraid of them.
Jehovah <WH3068> your God<WH430> who goeth<WH1980> before<WH6440> you<WH3898>, he will fight for you<WH6213>, according to all that he did for you in Egypt<WH4714> before your eyes<WH5869>,

and in the wilderness<WH4057>, where thou hast seen<WH7200> how that Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> bare<WH5375> thee<WH376>, as a man doth bear<WH5375> his son<WH1121>, in all the way<WH1870> that ye went<WH1980>, until ye came<WH935> unto this place<WH4725>.
Yet in this thing<WH1697> ye did not believe<WH539> Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>,

who went<WH1980> before<WH6440> you in the way<WH1870>, to seek you out<WH8446> a place<WH4725> to pitch your tents<WH2583> in<WH784>, in fire by night<WH3915>, to show<WH7200> you by what way<WH1870> ye should go<WH3212>, and in the cloud<WH6051> by day<WH3119>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> heard<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of your words<WH1697>, and was wroth<WH7107>, and sware<WH7650>, saying<WH559>,
Surely there shall not one<WH376> of these men<WH582> of this evil<WH7451> generation<WH1755> see<WH7200> the good<WH2896> land<WH776>, which I sware<WH7650> to give<WH5414> unto your fathers<WH1>,

save <WH2108> Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312>: he shall see<WH7200> it<WH5414>; and to him will I give the land<WH776> that<WH834> he hath trodden upon<WH1869>, and to his children<WH1121>, because he hath wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> Jehovah<WH3068>.
Also Jehovah<WH3068> was angry<WH599> with me for your sakes<WH1558>, saying<WH559>, Thou also shalt not go<WH935> in thither<WH8033>:

60 <WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126>, who standeth<WH5975> before<WH6440> thee<WH935>, he shall go in thither<WH2388>: encourage thou him<WH3478>; for he shall cause Israel to inherit it<WH5157>.

Moreover your little ones<WH2945>, that ye said<WH559> should be a prey<WH957>, and your children<WH1121>, that this day<WH3117> have no knowledge<WH3045> of good<WH2896> or evil<WH7451>, they shall go in<WH935> thither<WH5414>, and unto them will I give it<WH3423>, and they shall possess it.
But as for you<WH6437>, turn you<WH5265>, and take your journey into the wilderness<WH4057> by the way<WH1870> to the Red<WH5488> Sea<WH3220>.

Then ye answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> unto me<WH2398>, We have sinned against Jehovah<WH3068>, we will go up<WH5927> and fight<WH3898>, according to all that Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> us<WH2296>. And ye girded on every man<WH376> his weapons<WH3627> of war<WH4421>, and were forward<WH1951> to go up<WH5927> into the hill-country<WH2022>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto me<WH559>, Say unto them<WH5927>, Go not up, neither fight<WH3898>; for I am not among<WH7130> you<WH5062>; lest ye be smitten before<WH6440> your enemies<WH341>.

So I spake<WH1696> unto you<WH8085>, and ye hearkened not<WH4784>; but ye rebelled against the commandment<WH6310> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and were presumptuous<WH2102>, and went<WH5927> up<WH5927> into the hill-country<WH2022>.

And the Amorites<WH567>, that dwelt<WH3427> in that hill-country<WH2022>, came out<WH3318> against<WH7125> you<WH7291>, and chased you<WH1682>, as bees do<WH6213>, and beat<WH3807> you down in Seir<WH8165>, even unto Hormah<WH2767>.
And ye returned<WH7725> and wept<WH1058> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>; but Jehovah<WH3068> hearkened<WH8085> not to your voice<WH6963>, nor gave ear unto you<WH238>.
So ye abode<WH3427> in Kadesh<WH6946> many<WH7227> days<WH3117>, according unto the days<WH3117> that ye abode there<WH3427>.
